C & C's

Oyster Bar

About

C & C's Oyster Bar was established in 1996 by a pair of seafood lovers, for seafood lovers. We believe Appalachicola Bay oysters are the best in the world and we are proud to serve fresh local seafood daily!

Our Bay is in Danger!

The lack of freshwater flowing into our bay is killing our oysters and our way of life. Please help by signing this petition to increase the freshwater flowing out of the Appalachicoa River
